# f5distributedcloud_app_type (Data Source)

The `f5distributedcloud_app_type` data source retrieves information about an existing app type.

## Example Usage

```hcl
data "f5distributedcloud_app_type" "example" {
  name      = "my-app-type"
  namespace = "shared"
}

output "app_type" {
  value = data.f5distributedcloud_app_type.example.app_type
}
```



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the app type to look up.
- `namespace` (String) Namespace where the app type is located.

### Read-Only

- `app_type` (String) Type of the application.
- `description` (String) Description of the app type.
- `id` (String) Unique identifier of the app type.
